results.title: Evensong cinema slide
results.creator_credit: Gaumont British Picture Corporation and Victor Saville
results.credit_line: ACMI has endeavoured to contact the owners of these objects since their deposit in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful. We would welcome any information to identify the owners.
results.brief_description:
Two glass sheets: one glass only and the other with slide imagery which has a monochromatic emulsion that has then been hand painted with coloured pigments or dye.
TEXT on the slide reads: Evelyn Laye in Evensong with Fritz Kortner Alice Delysia
The two sheets of glass are held together using Gunn’s Slide branded tape: Gunn’s Slide, 9 Collins Place Melb. Cent. 2736.
On the clear glass slide there are remnants of handwritten detail which has nearly all worn off. It possibly says: STARTS..
results.creator_credit_for_label: Gaumont British Picture Corporation and Victor Saville

results.title: Emergency Call cinema slide
results.creator_credit: RKO Radio Pictures and Edward Cahn
results.credit_line: ACMI has endeavoured to contact the owners of these objects since their deposit in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful. We would welcome any information to identify the owners.
results.brief_description: Slide features imagery with a monochromatic emulsion that has then been hand painted with coloured pigments or dye. TEXT on the slide reads: Radio Pictures presents Bill Boyd with William Gargen Wynne Gibson in Emergency Call A spell-binding drama! Hurricane Speed! Heart-burning Romance! A Radio Picture Not suitable for General Exhibition

results.title: British Agent cinema slide
results.creator_credit: Warner Brothers First National Productions and Michael Curtiz
results.credit_line: ACMI has endeavoured to contact the owners of these objects since their deposit in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful. We would welcome any information to identify the owners.
results.brief_description:
Two glass sheets: one glass only and the other with slide imagery which has a monochromatic emulsion that has then been hand painted with coloured pigments or dye. Kay Francis Lesley Francis
It was said to be: “Too intimate to be printed!” “Too daring to be filmed!” British Agent Gunn Slide Not suitable for general exhibition On the front glass slide there is worn away hand writing: Monday matinee
results.creator_credit_for_label: Warner Brothers First National Productions and Michael Curtiz

results.title: Atlantic Adventure cinema slide
results.creator_credit: Columbia Pictures and Albert S. Rogell
results.credit_line: ACMI has used best endeavours to remain in contact with the owners of these objects since their deposit with ACMI in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful and ACMI would welcome any information to assist identify a current contact for their ownership.
results.brief_description: Two glass sheets: one glass only and the other with slide imagery which has a monochromatic emulsion that has then been hand painted with coloured pigments or dye. TEXT on the slide reads: Nancy Carroll Lloyd Nolan Harry Langdon in Atlantic Adventure Not suitable for General Exhibition. A Columbia production There is worn away black handwriting on the plain glass slide which says: Next Wed, Thurs, Fri

results.brief_description: Two glass sheets (one with slide imagery. A monochromatic emulsion then hand painted with coloured pigments or dye) / the other sheet glass only. TEXT on the slide reads: Mayfair at her feet - Scotland Yard on her trail Fascinating Elissa Landi in Always Goodbye A daring game of hearts and diamonds with Lewis Stone Paul Cavanagh For General Exhibition

results.title: Alibi Ike cinema slide
results.creator_credit: Warner Bros Pictures and Ray Enright
results.credit_line: ACMI has endeavoured to contact the owners of these objects since their deposit in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful. We would welcome any information to identify the owners.
results.brief_description: Two glass sheets: one glass only and the other with slide imagery which has a monochromatic emulsion that has then been hand painted with coloured pigments or dye. TEXT on the slide reads: Joe E. Brown & Ruth Donnelly ‘He’s ‘Dizzy!’ ‘He’s ‘Daffy!’ A Laff Riot with a Brand-New Twist! “Alibi Ike” For General Exhibition Gunn Slide Gum edged tape reads: Gunn Slide 9 Collins Place, Melb. Cen

results.brief_description: Slide imagery with a monochromatic emulsion that has then been hand painted with coloured pigments or dye. TEXT on the slide reads: RKO Radio Pictures presents John Barrymore in A Bill of Divorcement A play that ran a solid year in London and New York with Katharine Hepburn Billie Bourk David Manners Barrymore in the biggest story and finest part of his brilliant career.

results.title: Toy lantern slides
results.credit_line: ACMI Collection. Donated by William Kerr on behalf of Edwin Schefferle.
results.brief_description: There are five parts to the Sea Life slides, each slide has 4 images. These small slides have red sealing tape around the edges. These slides form part of The Empire Magic Lantern Outfit with removable chimney and internal wooden block. The lantern is housed in original box with metal handle, and internal red and blue graphic for: The Empire Magic Lantern Outfit. 20 glass slides in custom box, length of textile to keep box shut, 2 small empty boxes which act to store slides in a snug manner.
results.description: There are five parts to the Sea Life slides, each slide has 4 images. These small slides have red sealing tape around the edges. These slides form part of The Empire Magic Lantern Outfit with removable chimney and internal wooden block. The lantern is housed in original box with metal handle, and internal red and blue graphic for: The Empire Magic Lantern Outfit. 20 glass slides in custom box, length of textile to keep box shut, 2 small empty boxes which act to store slides in a snug manner.
